briefTitle: Health Information Technology for COVID-19 Testing in Schools (SCALE-UP Counts)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Students

* Attends school at any of the participating schools from the districts the research team is working with

Parents

* Legal guardian/parent of the student
* Has a functioning cellular phone that can receive calls and text messages

Exclusion Criteria:

* None

outcomeMeasures.title: Testing Uptake- The Number of Valid Responses That Confirmed COVID-19 Testing Was Completed by Households
outcomeMeasures.description: The study team will examine whether students and/or members of their household tested by analyzing the number of valid responses that confirmed COVID-19 testing was completed by households

outcomeMeasures.title: Missed School Days
outcomeMeasures.description: The study team will examine the number of missed school days enrolled students missed due to COVID-19 related reasons (e.g., exposure, testing).
